sets.tps: 96 En, 200 R Atk, 4 M Def, 200 R Defense
sets.detail:
A set up sweeper to be used in bane of haste teams 
 With the energy it can use magnify twice before going on the attack with 2 shadow bursts or 1 nova ray before having to recover energy
sets.author: mrvincent05

sets.tps: 200 HP, 200 R Atk, 64 R Def, 32 Sp
sets.detail:
200 Ranged Attack and Smart are to hit as hard as possible 
 200 Health with 64 Ranged Defense makes Smart Falkyrie Metal Blast 2HKO 
 32 Speed with Sluggish outspeeds Sluggish Sedimars 
 0 Energy = 266 Energy at level 50 for (6 Spectral Bursts + 1 Magnify)
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer

sets.tps: 200 HP, 20 En, 128 M Def, 152 R Def
sets.detail:
200 HP with 128 Melee Defense and Robust makes Hasty 40 Melee Attack Sedimars Earthquake 4HKO after Health Amulet 
 200 HP with 152 Ranged Defense and Clever makes Dark Essence Tiklipse Dark Surge 4HKO after Health Amulet 
 20 Energy = 270 Energy at level 50 for (3 Flash 'n Flees + 3 Spites) 
 0 Speed UPs and Very Sluggish allow Charonyx to safely bring in teammates
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer
